amendatorysection.para: The initial members of the council shall be appointed for terms of one, two, or three years. All subsequent appointments shall be made for terms of three years. Any vacancy on the council shall be filled in the same manner in which the original appointment was made and shall last for the duration of the term vacated. Appointments to the council shall be made within ninety days after September 6, 1991. The council shall select a chairperson, a vice-chairperson, and such other officers as it deems necessary.
